description:
Ox Ford triumphantly raises Excalibur to the heavens! Instead of fame and glory, he gets a painfully detailed account of Excalibur’s past lives and loves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La leggenda della sacra spada 2! Che ne dite di ubriacarci, giocare d`azzardo e spassarcela?
La légende de l`Épée Sacrée 2. Boire, frapper, manger, vertu ?
Legend of the Holy Sword 2: Wanna Go Drinking, Gambling, and Playing?
Seiken Densetsu 2: Nomu, Utsu, Kau, Ittoku?
聖剣伝説2 ~飲む, 打つ, 買う, いっとく?~
